original_text: When the crowds learned it, they followed him, and he welcomed them and spoke to them of the kingdom of God and cured those who had need of healing.
korean_text: 무리가 알고 따라왔거늘 예수께서 그들을 영접하사 하나님 나라의 일을 이야기하시며 병 고칠 자들은 고치시더라

sentences.original_text: and spoke to them of the kingdom of God
and cured those who had need of healing.
sentences.korean_translation: 고침을 받아야 할 사람들을 고쳐 주셨습니다.
